<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Just the Tool](/Feats.aspx?ID=3865) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 205</row>

**Archetype** [Mind Smith](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=194)

**Prerequisites**
[Mind Smith Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3862)

</column>

---

You temporarily change your weapon's shape to assist you in the field. You morph your weapon into a single simple tool, such as a shovel or crowbar, to help with a mundane task. You can't replicate entire tool kits with this ability. You can use this action again to change your mind weapon back to a weapon.
name: Just the Tool
